text:
="preserve">Gerald Hiken (May 27, 1927 – January 6, 2021) was an American actor. He was born in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Hiken was nominated for a Tony Award in 1980 for his role in "Strider". He was in "The Candidate" (1972), "Reds" (1981), and "Fat Man and Little Boy" (1989).
Hiken died on January 6, 2021 in San Francisco, California at the age of 93.
